basics.name: Sayeed Mahmood Evrenos
basics.label: Open-source enthusiast and Linux advocate building intuitive front-end experiences
basics.summary: I create privacy-focused, open-source tools while diving deep into web development, security, and emerging technologies. Always learning, always building something meaningful.

work.name: Raycast
work.summary: Contributing to Raycast's Windows expansion as part of their exclusive Closed Alpha Program
responsibilities: Rigorously testing Raycast's Alpha Windows build across various use cases and workflows
Providing detailed bug reports and user experience feedback to shape the final product

education.summary: Graduated with distinction, earning an A+ grade in Higher Secondary studies.
Achieved top academic performance with a golden A+ grade.

projects.name: Zaviye
highlights: Engineered a stateless AI chat application with distinct agents for practical and developer workflows
Demonstrates proficiency in full-stack TypeScript, prompt engineering, and building responsive UIs with React and Next.js

projects.name: GoferShell
projects.description: Cross-shell CLI utilities written in Go
highlights: Created versatile command-line tools that work seamlessly across different shells
Features include smart downloaders powered by aria2 and yt-dlp, plus an update checker for Arch Linux repos and AUR packages

projects.name: Rustor
highlights: Built a high-performance fetch utility leveraging Rust's memory safety and speed
Demonstrates expertise in systems programming and performance optimization
